title: Add core team section

requirements.text: Create a 'Core Team' section component that displays team members of Raavni Agrobyte (OPC) Pvt. Ltd., emphasizing the women-led nature of the organization with individual team member profiles including photos, names, roles, and brief descriptions

quotes: Add one more section for core team

acceptanceCriteria: Core Team section is visually integrated with the existing earthy, organic design aesthetic using warm earth tones (terracotta, amber, sage green)
Section displays multiple team member cards with profile images, names, and roles
Layout is responsive and works on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices
Section is added to the main App.tsx component in the appropriate position within the page flow
Navigation menu is updated to include a 'Team' link that scrolls to the core team section

requirements.text: Render generated team member profile images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
acceptanceCriteria: Team member images are loaded from the frontend/public/assets/generated folder
Images are properly sized and optimized for web display
Fallback handling is implemented if images fail to load

constraints: Maintain consistency with existing design system using OKLCH color variables and earth tone palette
Follow the established component structure pattern used in AboutUs.tsx, Products.tsx, and FarmerSupport.tsx
Do not modify immutable frontend paths including hooks and main.tsx
nonGoals: Backend data storage for team members
Admin interface for managing team member information
Interactive features like team member detail modals or filtering

required: Professional portrait photo of a woman team member with warm, natural lighting and neutral background for founder/CEO profile (team-member-1.dim_400x400.png)
Professional portrait photo of a woman team member with warm, natural lighting and neutral background for operations lead profile (team-member-2.dim_400x400.png)
Professional portrait photo of a woman team member with warm, natural lighting and neutral background for product development lead profile (team-member-3.dim_400x400.png)
Professional portrait photo of a woman team member with warm, natural lighting and neutral background for farmer relations coordinator profile (team-member-4.dim_400x400.png)
